comments.author: Stefan Guggisberg
comments.body:
the spec doesn't mention whether Node.unlock() should remove the token from the session.

intuitively i'd agree with you that it should be removed.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Reopened to fix the version tags.

description:
I do the followin steps:

* node.lock()
* session.getLockTokens() -> This show the lock token generated by the
previous lock.
* node.unlock()
* session.getLockTokens() -> Still show me the generated token ¿?¿?

If I unlock a node, the token should'n be delete from the session?
summary: Lock tokens reains in session after unlock
